summary: Admin Production was updated to use separate Double/Single quantities and rates with a new total formula and storage shape, and User Production History was changed to aggregate/show all workers. However, the requested increase in User Dashboard tile label font size is not clearly implemented; the ActionTile “user” label style appears small. Several unrelated authentication/registration/admin UI changes were also introduced beyond the request.

missing_requirements.requirement: Increase the font size of the four User Dashboard section tiles (Production, Snacks, Payment/Loan, Work) so the section titles are visibly larger and easier to read on mobile.
missing_requirements.reason: The only concrete tile-label styling change shown is in ActionTile, where the “user” variant uses `text-xs`, which is not a larger font size and may be smaller than desired; no other diff evidence shows the dashboard tile labels being increased.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to authentication/registration flow (e.g., removing registration toggle, adding stable numeric user IDs, updating pending request types, ensuring user IDs on approval).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1..REQ-5, which are limited to Admin Production form/data changes and User Dashboard/Production History UI/typography/mobile layout fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin panel title/branding styling changes (e.g., prominent uppercase "ADMIN PANEL" with Impact font, gradient header).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements focus specifically on the Admin Production section form/data changes, not global admin panel restyling.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad theming/visual changes across multiple admin sections (Work/Nasta/PaymentLoan gradients, colorful worker selection buttons).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements do not ask for these sections’ theme changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Global CSS additions unrelated to the specific dashboard tile font request (e.g., OKLCH theme variables, multiple background gradients, generic touch-target minimum sizes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested by REQ-1..REQ-5 (which target specific user dashboard typography/layout and production views).
